text:
The following is a list with the Billboard Music Award winners for Top Social Artist. This is one of two fan-voted categories in the award show.[1] Justin Bieber is the most awarded and nominated artist in this category with six consecutive wins. His winning streak was broken as of the 2017 ceremony by BTS, who were the first K-pop group ever to be nominated for and win a Billboard Music Award.[2]

Winners and nominees [ edit ]
title: Billboard Music Award for Top Social Artist
